attributes.action: Stop penalising public sector workers by implementing below inflation pay rises as an excuse to support the UK's failing economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Public sector workers are unfairly penalised when it comes around to the yearly pay offers. They are forced to take below inflation rises as an excuse to support the economy. I believe this to be unfair.
Why should the public sector be forced into below inflation pay offers as an excuse to bolster the UK's failing economy.
